Drawing

Class ClickBoxManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawing.ClickBoxManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditBoxManager, TextBoxManager

    public abstract class ClickBoxManager
extends java.lang.Object
    in the clickboxmanager an arraylist filled with click boxes, we use this arraylist to make the drawing of the boxes easier.
    Author:
    luukmiddelweerd
